name: The Midnight Club: An Escape Room
name_original: The Midnight Club: An Escape Room
description:
You crossed a crowd you had no business crossing, borrowed dough you couldn’t pay back. You should be sleeping the big sleep right now, but I figured I’d give you one last chance. If you can find your way outta this place, I’ll let you run free...

Another text-based escape room! Graphics made using The Sims 4, with custom art from the gallery.
